content.explanation:
There are special patterns for factoring expressions involving cubes:

Sum of cubes: a³ + b³ = (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)
Difference of cubes: a³ - b³ = (a - b)(a² + ab + b²)

Memory trick for signs in the second factor:
• Sum of cubes → minus in the middle
• Difference of cubes → plus in the middle
content.key_point: First recognize if you have perfect cubes, then apply the appropriate formula.

interactive.question: Which formula applies to x³ - 125?
options: Sum of cubes: (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)
Difference of cubes: (a - b)(a² + ab + b²)
Neither, it's not a perfect cube
